links.title: Morgan Stanley is making a huge change to its Tesla story
links.description: A lot of analysts are racking their brains to figure out how to value Tesla's multiple lines of business - cars, solar, energy, batteries - and determine whether the company deserves a market cap of more than $50 billion.
